text.en:
A quest can depend on multiple quests at the same time and can depend on quests from other chapters.
Also the width of the dependency line can be customized.
text.ru:
A quest can depend on multiple quests at the same time and can depend on quests from other chapters.
Also the width of the dependency line can be customized.
text.zh:
一个任务可以同时依赖多个任务，可以依赖其它章节的任务。
另外依赖线的宽度可以自定义。
